metadata.title: CVE-2023-1529 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in WebHID in Google Chrome prior to111.0.5563.110 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a malicious HID device. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
